synopsis.text: As Prince Siegfried embarks on a hunting expedition, he encounters a captivating swan adorned with a crown, which leads him to a mystical lake. The swan, however, is not an ordinary bird but a cursed princess named Odette, transformed into a swan by day under the malevolent spell of the wizard Rothbart. The only hope for Odette to break free from this enchantment is to find a man who can truly love her with all his heart. Enter Prince Siegfried, who becomes enamored with the beautiful princess and vows to save her. But Rothbart has other plans, and the path to true love is filled with obstacles that the young prince must overcome to break the curse and win Odette's heart. This enchanting anime weaves a tale of love, magic, and adventure that will leave you spellbound.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
